statements: SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours;
SELECT employee_id, work_hours, work_date FROM employee_work_hours ORDER BY work_hours DESC;
SELECT task_id, work_hours, work_date FROM employee_work_hours WHERE work_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY work_hours ASC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(work_hours) AS total_hours FROM employee_work_hours GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT MAX(work_hours) AS max_hours, MIN(work_hours) AS min_hours FROM employee_work_hours;
SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY work_date DESC, task_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(work_hours) AS total_hours FROM employee_work_hours WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours > 40;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, AVG(work_hours) AS avg_hours FROM employee_work_hours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_hours < 8;
SELECT task_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM employee_work_hours WHERE work_hours >= 8 GROUP BY task_id ORDER BY total_entries DESC;

SELECT employee_id, DATE_FORMAT(work_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, CAST(work_hours AS CHAR) AS hours_worked FROM employee_work_hours WHERE work_hours < 4 ORDER BY employee_id ASC, work_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT work_date, start_time, end_time FROM employee_work_hours WHERE work_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT employee_id, end_time, start_time, work_date FROM employee_work_hours WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY work_date DESC;
SELECT task_description, task_duration FROM waste_management_tasks WHERE task_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_tasks ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY work_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_work_hours WHERE work_date ='2022-01-20' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_duration FROM waste_management_tasks WHERE task_duration > 60 ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_work_hours WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY end_time DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_workdays FROM employee_work_hours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_workdays > 5 ORDER BY total_workdays DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, hours_worked FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE hours_worked >= 8;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM WasteTasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT total_pay FROM Payroll WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Payroll WHERE total_pay > 1000 ORDER BY total_pay DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours WHERE hours_worked > 8
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM WasteTasks WHERE LENGTH(task_description) > 50
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM Payroll GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM EmployeeWorkHours ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT employee_id, total_pay FROM Payroll WHERE hourly_rate > 20 ORDER BY total_pay DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Employee_Work_Hours;
SELECT employee_id, work_date FROM Employee_Work_Hours ORDER BY work_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM Waste_Management_Tasks WHERE task_id > 3;
SELECT employee_id, work_date, hours_worked FROM Payroll WHERE total_pay > 1000;
SELECT schedule_id, task_id, employee_id, work_date FROM Scheduling ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Work_Hours ORDER BY employee_id DESC, work_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM Employee_Work_Hours WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours_worked > 40;
SELECT Task.task_name, Payroll.total_pay FROM Waste_Management_Tasks AS Task JOIN Payroll ON Task.task_id = Payroll.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Payroll WHERE hourly_rate > 20 ORDER BY total_pay DESC;

SELECT Scheduling.work_date, Employee_Work_Hours.hours_worked FROM Scheduling JOIN Employee_Work_Hours ON Scheduling.employee_id = Employee_Work_Hours.employee_id AND Scheduling.work_date = Employee_Work_Hours.work_date;
SELECT * FROM Employees
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20
SELECT employee_name, task_name, work_date FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeTasks ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeTasks.employee_id JOIN Tasks ON EmployeeTasks.task_id = Tasks.task_id
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_name ASC
SELECT * FROM WorkHours WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY work_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, hourly_rate ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hourly_rate > 20 ORDER BY department
SELECT e.employee_name, w.work_date, wt.task_id FROM Employees e INNER JOIN WorkHours w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id INNER JOIN EmployeeTasks wt ON e.employee_id = wt.employee_id
SELECT t.task_name, et.task_id, p.total_pay FROM Tasks t INNER JOIN EmployeeTasks et ON t.task_id = et.task_id INNER JOIN Payroll p ON et.workhour_id = p.workhour_id

SELECT e.employee_name, wt.employee_id, p.total_pay FROM Employees e INNER JOIN EmployeeTasks wt ON e.employee_id = wt.employee_id INNER JOIN Payroll p ON wt.workhour_id = p.workhour_id WHERE p.total_pay > 1000
